titleStmt.title: A true account of the proceedings against John Ayloff, and Richard Nelthorp Esquires at the King's-[B]ench-Bar,
titleStmt.author: Ayloffe, John, d. 1685.
Nelthorpe, Richard, d. 1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to His most Sacred Majesty,
publicationStmt.pubPlace: Printed at London, and re-printed at Edinburgh, :

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles, California.
